create_file.name: create_file
create_file.description: Create a new file at the specified path.

path.description: The path where the file should be created.

create_directory.name: create_directory
create_directory.description: Create a new directory at the specified path.

path.description: The path where the directory should be created.

delete_file.name: delete_file
delete_file.description: Delete a file at the specified path.

path.description: The path of the file to delete.

does_file_exist.name: does_file_exist
does_file_exist.description: Check if a file exists at the specified path.

path.description: The path of the file to check.

get_directory_tree.name: get_directory_tree
get_directory_tree.description: Return the tree structure of a directory, including hidden files.

path.description: The directory path to get the tree structure for.

prefix.description: Prefix for formatting the tree structure.

read_file.name: read_file
read_file.description: Read the content of a file.

path.description: The path of the file to read.
The path of the file to write to.

content.description: The content to write to the file.

path.description: The path of the file to append to.

content.description: The content to append to the file.

copy_file.name: copy_file
copy_file.description: Copy a file from source to destination.

move_file.name: move_file
move_file.description: Move a file from source to destination.

open_an_image.name: open_an_image
open_an_image.description: Open and read an image file, returning the binary data.

path.description: The file path to the image.

move_the_image.name: move_the_image
move_the_image.description: Move an image file from one location to another.

path_before.description: The current file path of the image.

path_after.description: The new file path where the image should be moved.

generate_image.name: generate_image
generate_image.description: Generate an image from a text prompt using the Gemini API.

prompt.description: The text prompt to generate the image from.

dimensions.description: The desired dimensions for the generated image (e.g., '512x512').

path.description: The directory path to save the image. If None or empty, saves to the current working directory.

name_of_image.description: The name to use for the saved image file (without extension).

modify_image.name: modify_image
modify_image.description: Modify an existing image based on a text prompt using the Gemini API.

path_of_the_image_to_modify.description: Path to the image file to be modified.

path_to_save_the_image.description: Directory path to save the modified image. If None or empty, saves to the current working directory.

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the modification to apply.

name_of_image.description: The name to use for the saved modified image file (without extension).

dimensional_preference.description: Additional dimensional preferences for the modification (e.g., '512x512').
